Literature.Title: Alignment-based design and synthesis of new antimicrobial Aurein-derived peptides with improved activity against Gram-negative bacteria and evaluation of their toxicity on human cells.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human normal skin cells Hu02:IC50=450.25 µg/ml
